goal: Get higher weekly sales than the competitor restaurant.
Reach the bottom floor of the dungeon.
Help defend against an invasion of monsters (Happens on the 30th. Tied to suspicious people staying after the bazaar.)

dialogue: Let me tell you about the lake here in {w@name}.
Just tell me if you change your mind!

props: Go out and explore some lakes!
I hope you learn to like lakes as much as I do!
The middle of a lake would be a great place to hide some treasure...
Did you know you can fish at lakes?

dialogue: I think you'll really like it here.
If you need tools or seeds, come to the town and buy them!
Did you want to know something?
You should try to make it to the next festival!
I have no more to say.
Hi, do you want to come in?
Hi, do you want to come in?
Hi, did you want to come in?
Too bad. I won't let you.
I sell seeds. Is there something you want?
I sell tools. Is there something you want?
I'll buy whatever. What have you got for me?
My two grandchildren are old enough to work now.
Would you like to hire them?
Have you changed your mind about hiring my two grandchildren?
Thanks for taking care of my two grandchildren!
